replies.body: The ban year can give you some insight into what you were banned for.

> [{quoted}](name=Riot Tantram,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=Wt7YKFry,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2016-10-20T20:32:46.898+0000)
>
> The ban year can give you some insight into what you were banned for.

When i try to log in it does not give me a date. all it tells me is my account has been permanently suspended. And to check the email for details about the suspension.

But i never received an email.
Are perminate suspensions changed to 1 year bans or something?

> [{quoted}](name=AirKingNeo,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=Wt7YKFry,comment-id=00010001,timestamp=2016-10-20T23:09:50.789+0000)
>
> Are perminate suspensions changed to 1 year bans or something?

No, the year indicates as to why you were banned.  For example, 2100 is account security compromised, 2222 is a chargeback issue.

Please be patient with the ticket, it can take a few days before they can get to it depending on the backlog. If you bump the ticket it will be pushed to the back of the queue so only do it if you need to add necessary information.

I should have been sent an email letting me know why i was banned to begin with.
But i never received any email at all.
Do you possibly have LoL hooked up to an outdated email? Recently I found all my RP receipts I never though I got because I was using an old email.

> [{quoted}](name=VenturaThePoro,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=Wt7YKFry,comment-id=000000000000,timestamp=2016-10-21T02:05:50.612+0000)
>
> Do you possibly have LoL hooked up to an outdated email? Recently I found all my RP receipts I never though I got because I was using an old email.

i have 11 accounts on 11 dif emails. this account is just not registered with my main email. So i don't check it very often.

If i had been sent an email at the time of the ban i could have sorted this a long time ago.

Post a screenshot of the popup in the game client, maybe it'll show something you didn't notice? :o Also, don't bump your ticket, if you do it'll be sent to the back of the queue. Only update it if necessary information needs to be given.

got a response now after 3 days. it was a random $20 chargeback and so my account was perma banned.
I have done the repayment so all should be well now.
Good to know, Should edit your post to say "Edit: Emailed received etc"

> [{quoted}](name=dapositiveviking,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=Wt7YKFry,comment-id=0004,timestamp=2016-10-21T00:43:21.996+0000)
>
> you verified your email?

I receive emails when i purchase RP so i guess it is verified.
They don't send Emails for manual bans, even though you will get a message saying to check your Email.
